abstract: Discovery, Imax and Sony are forming a joint venture for a 3-D television channel, two people with knowledge of the deal said Tuesday.
snippet: Discovery, Imax and Sony are forming a joint venture for a 3-D television channel, two people with knowledge of the deal said Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Updated throughout | 12:18 p.m.  Discovery, Imax and Sony confirmed on Tuesday that they are forming a joint venture for a 3-D television channel.

headline.main: Discovery, Imax and Sony Form 3-D Television Channel
